scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p test/integration/ && dotnet build netcore
scripts.build:test:cover: npm run build && npm run test:cover
scripts.test:cover: npx nyc -r cobertura -r lcov -r text-summary mocha test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js -- --timeout 10000 --exit -R mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=mocha-multi-reporters-config.json
scripts.watch: npm run build -- -w | npx mocha --timeout 10000 --exit --reporter min -w test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js

parameters.name: netCoreSdkVersion
parameters.label: .Net Core SDK Version
parameters.description: Set the .net core SDK version to use, when multiple are installed in the system where the driver is running. Leave empty to ignore this setting.

parameters.name: address
parameters.label: MTConnect Agent Address
parameters.description: Ip or Hostname of the MTConnect Agent

parameters.name: port
parameters.label: MTConnect Agent port
parameters.description: Port of the MTConnect Agent (leave as -1 for it to not be added)

parameters.name: device
parameters.label: MTConnect Device
parameters.description: When specifying a device, all MTConnect interactions will filter by device.

property.name: expression
property.label: Expression
property.description: JSONata Expression to extract property from the JSON structure

event.name: mtConnectEventType
event.label: Event Type
event.description: Types of MTConnect events that we are able to use.

command.name: mtConnectCommandType
command.label: Command Type
command.description: Types of MTConnect commands that we are able to use.
